data.name: Dog Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Dog Adventure is an incredibly challenging side-scrolling game. If you like challenging platformers, then this game is definitely for you. In this game you play as a funny dog ​​that needs to get into its house. Complete all the hardest levels of this game with funny music!

In this game you have to play a dog as a dog. Overcoming the most difficult traps and obstacles, complete this game. It won't be easy, as this platformer is incredibly challenging. If you are not afraid of difficulties, then you should definitely go through this game. To pass the level you need to get to the doghouse. But do not think that everything is so simple! First you need to take a bone and only after that you can complete the level. Play the game with funny music that will raise your mood as you progress through this game!

Features of the game:
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Incredibly cool, challenging and interesting levels!
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Incredibly beautiful graphics!

data.short_description: Dog Adventure is an incredibly challenging side-scrolling game. If you like challenging platformers, then this game is definitely for you. In this game you play as a funny dog ​​that needs to get into its house. Complete all the hardest levels of this game with funny music!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 6XXX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
